sentences: ", "Steven Paul Jobs was the chairman, chief executive officer (CEO), and co-founder of Apple Inc.; chairman and majority shareholder of Pixar; a member of The Walt Disney Company's board of directors following The Walt Disney Company's board of directors acquisition of Pixar; and the founder, chairman, and CEO of NeXT.
